name: apache-sedona
author: Apache Sedona, original authors are listed on https://github.com/myuwono/zeppelin-leaflet

scripts.prepare: jq '{ type: .helium.type, name: .name, description: .description, artifact: (.name + "@"+ .version), license: .license, icon: .helium.icon}' package.json > sedona-zeppelin.json
scripts.helium.dev: jq --arg pwd `pwd` '{ type: .helium.type, name: .name, description: .description, artifact: $pwd, license: .license, icon: .helium.icon}' package.json > sedona-zeppelin.json
